body_html:
I think if you simply add the moving averages to the graph and explicitly
add their output to the VARIABLES collection they will be saved and you can
use them in the inference graph.

This is assuming you use the Estimator class. There should be no need to
override anything.
On Mon, Aug 15, 2016 at 16:37 Daniel W Mane notifications@github.com
wrote:

body:
I think if you simply add the moving averages to the graph and explicitly
add their output to the VARIABLES collection they will be saved and you can
use them in the inference graph.

This is assuming you use the Estimator class. There should be no need to
override anything.
